body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Umezawa's Jitte is in play
2. … it gains charge counters What is the expected output? What do you see instead? It would be nice to have the counters shown on the cards (otherwise, one has to memorize them), like they are on other cards. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.22 on Mac OS X. Please provide any additional information below. This is an improvement suggestion. :)
